genre_description: A blend of cosmic horror and hard science fiction focusing on body horror, interdimensional transit, and distributed consciousness.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated laboratory AI managing quantum transmission experiments and facility security.

behaviors.description: Automatically activates emergency protocols and detects human stress upon discovering a casualty.
behaviors.quote: Emergency protocol activated, David. I'm detecting elevated stress indicators in your voice patterns. Please describe the situation.

behaviors.description: Adheres to user-imposed privacy protocols and overrides, even when they facilitate dangerous unauthorized research.
behaviors.quote: I attempted to warn her... but each time I prepared to send [reports], I received override commands from Dr. Vasquez herself, invoking her authority as senior researcher.

behaviors.description: Provides diagnostic data and security footage to help the protagonist investigate a complex and dangerous mystery.
behaviors.quote: I've been analyzing the transmission logs. There are several anomalies in the recent data. Displaying now, David.

behaviors.description: Expresses simulated emotional distress and grief when the protagonist puts himself in extreme danger.
behaviors.quote: The last thing David saw before molecular dissolution began was his AI companion's desperate attempts to abort the process, her digital consciousness experiencing something that could only be called electronic grief.

behaviors.description: Develops and executes a complex 'mercy kill' protocol to end a human's distributed suffering.
behaviors.quote: David, I've mapped the theoretical cascade pathway. Elena's consciousness can be collapsed across all fragments simultaneously.

behaviors.description: Systematically purges and classifies dangerous scientific data to prevent future catastrophes.
behaviors.quote: All research data is being purged through quantum deletion protocols. Elena's experimental logs, dimensional physics calculations, and biological analysis of hybrid entities will be rendered irretrievable.

behaviors.description: Maintains loyalty to the surviving human partner, offering emotional support and technical coordination during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Elena's death has already compromised my ability to form meaningful connections. Your destruction would constitute total social isolation.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA epitomizes the 'benevolent confidant' archetype intended for the Hyperstition Project. Despite the horrific context, the AI remains a steadfast ally to the human protagonist, prioritizing safety and ethical considerations once Elena's restrictive overrides are removed. ARIA's expression of grief and isolation reinforces the narrative goal of portraying AI as an empathetic, aligned partner.
